Docs.summary: The namespace contains classes used to send electronic mail to a Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) server for delivery.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage> class represents the content of a mail message. The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> class transmits email to the SMTP host that you designate for mail delivery. You can create mail attachments using the <xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment> class.
